fxInfo_clarification: This variable is dichotomized in a similar fashion as the V-Dem Multiple Selection questions with each binary answer category suffixed with "_<Response number>".
fxInfo_ordering: Asked only if CABINET is answered 1.
fxInfo_question: Who has the authority to dismiss the cabinet/ministers?

fxInfo_responses.value: Head of State (use this choice for single executive systems). (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_CABDISS_1]
First (or only) Chamber of the Legislature. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_CABDISS_3]
Both Chambers of the Legislature acting separately. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_CABDISS_5]
Both Chambers of the Legislature in a joint session. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_CABDISS_6]
Other, please specify in the comments section. (0=No, 1=Yes) [e_CABDISS_96]

name: e_ccp_cabdiss
